name: 'The Dover Test' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the news program that wanted an interview with Donna?
questions.explanation:
Dateline.

	Annabeth told Donna that her story could become a movie-of-the-week, but she would have to quit her job if it came to that.

questions.text:
Who did CJ make this comment to?
"You go, girl. Do people still say that?"
questions.explanation:
Annabeth.

	CJ liked the fact that Annabeth didn't let Hutchinson get to her and that's why she made this remark.

questions.text: The nurse that was staying with Leo through the day was named Mrs. Chakrabarty. What did Mrs. Chakrabarty tell Leo her daughter's name was?
questions.explanation:
Malti.

	Suleka Mathew played Leo's nurse, Mrs. Chakrabarty. This was the second time she was seen on "The West Wing". Mrs. Chakrabarty's daughter, Malti, was played by Meera Patwahoran and "The West Wing" was her television debut.

questions.text: The flowers that Josh saw on Donna's desk were from Colin.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Josh read the note thinking they were from him. He referred to Colin as blarney boy when he asked Donna if they were from him. Donna said they weren't. Josh gives all of Donna's boyfriends nicknames according to their profession or birthplace.

questions.text: How many steps did Charlie's office have to be from CJ's office?
questions.explanation:
Less than 100.

	Margaret told Charlie because he was the deputy special assistant to the chief of staff he had to be close to CJ's office. Charlie said he could run, but Margaret said special assistants don't run.

questions.text: Where did CJ, Annabeth, Toby, and the President go to at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Walter Reed Hospital.

	Annabeth wanted the press to take pictures of the President with the wounded soldiers, but CJ didn't think it would make a good photo op. In the end, Toby told CJ that Annabeth agreed it wasn't right for a photo op.

questions.text: What kind of wine did Margaret say she drank?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	Josh and Toby walked over to Donna and Margaret and Donna thought Josh was bringing her a glass of wine. Donna told him that she didn't drink red. Margaret said she did, but Josh had already taken a drink out of his glass. Toby handed Donna and Margaret champagne.

questions.text: When looking at the building that would be the Bartlet Presidential library, where did the President say a plaque would have to be placed?
questions.correct: Where he first had a cigarette
options: Where he kissed a girl for the first time
The place where he first met Abbey
At the statue that was going to be made of him
questions.explanation:
Where he first had a cigarette.

	The episode began with a small party being held in honor of the mock-up for the presidential library. The President pointed out the architect, but his name was never mentioned.

questions.text: Did Mr. Godfrey, the slain soldier's father, take President Bartlet's phone call?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Debbie talked to Mr. Godfrey over the phone, but he wouldn't talk to the President. When Annabeth suggested the President go to the funeral, CJ shot the idea down because it was a private funeral.

questions.text: Where is the Air Force base in the United States, that the name for the Dover test was taken?
questions.explanation:
Delaware.

	Dover Air Force Base is located in Dover, Delaware and is the sight for the returning soldiers who died or were wounded in combat.
